column1: Body
This app is easy to do at home
Love it
Excellent App

This app is functional and worth it. Classes are straightforward and have sufficient depth. There is one instructor for all of them which adds consistency to your routine.*good action for runners**Good a wide range of abilities"
I like it. But, to my opinion, three is not enough short sessions, which are 10 minutes and less.
The videos are super helpful for anyone who doesn't know the poses, and the ability to create myvown class tobfit my needs is perfect. I've already suggested this app to others.
I like the peacuful sound of the instructor and easy flow. Brings nice after yoga feeling to my day after session in the morning.
Love this app for for in between studio classes during the week when you need a quick fix. Great for beginners and seasoned yogis.
I love this yoga app. Well worth the money. Great classes, and you can modify to your needs!
really good work, love it.
I love the classes and I love how easy they are to do wherever you are
It's very easy to fallow.
Works great, downloads fast, no issues
I luv it
Good quality video and sound. Easy to customise your own classes. Good range of different classes. Posture search could be improved by a more intelligent search but a really minor issue.
Love this yoga app. I have tried so many others but really wanted one that was for a beginner and that I could customise.

Good design and easy to follow. However,  I'm experiencing problems when I try to download classes. Just get the notification "download failed" every time the 60 minute programme has reached about 90% complete. Currently using an samsung android tablet.

I don't write many reviews but this app was well worth the purchase. It has several classes of different levels of intensity and different durations. It flows nicely and allows you to choose different ambient sounds and you can even customize the class.
Best gift ever from my beautiful daughter.
Nice mixture of everything and very easy to get started.

My job is kind of stressful and has me sitting a lot. It's been havoc on my lower back and posture. My doc suggested I exercise more and find things that help reduce my anxiety. Yoga sounded like the perfect fit but I was lost on where to start. This app is wonderful. It had combinations for beginners to more experienced and the instructions are clear and easy to follow. I've been using it for a couple of weeks now and I have felt a difference in my body. My hips aren't as tight and My posture is improving.
The preset programs are just what I was looking for.  More than worth the cost.
Great classes and lots of variation. Really useful app if you want to continue yoga practice in your home.

I've always wanted to do yoga but have only done it a few times before getting this app. I hate being the guy that doesn't know how to do the poses in a class. This app has allowed me to build confidence while learning the poses and strengthening/stretching my muscles. I can't wait to try my first yoga class since using this app.
Great
Really great app. I use it regularly. However, it would be great to have Google fit integration.
Brilliant for a beginner like myself.
Never tired yoga before this, easy to follow great videos to watch while practicing definitely worth the money spent.

I have been using this app in the ipad and I love it. I can choose to work strength, flexibility, relaxation and a combination sequences, adequate to my yoga level and it has short sequences of 15 mins when I only have a few minutes to spare.

I've tried many yoga apps and this is, by far, the best available.  There are still a few improvements possible (particularly in the editing aspect) but the variety and quality of the included classes plus the ability to create my own and share between yogi friends makes this top notch.  Thanks, Gaiam!
I don't have time to go to a class. This allows me to do this at home, in my time.
great stuff, worth every cent
I have a lot of lower back pain and the 15 minute flex and relax routines are perfect for alleviating that pain.
This is by far the best app for Yoga that I have tried, it got me hooked up to Yoga.
Im a bigger person but most of the begginner stuff can easily be modified to suit me better. I like it and will continue to use it to reduce stress and become for flexible and help my back pain.
The addition of quick fix makes this even better. I might not have time for a full class every day but at least I can get a quick fix.
Has helped me manage stress and feel better in my body. I adore this app.
Love these yoga sessions.  Each one is relaxing but effective and so easy to follow and do regularly.  Excellent value.
I use it daily. Great range of classes well presented, and works on Chromecast.
Very easy to follow, small files, a variety of options depending on your time and goals.  Incredibly happy with it!
Beautiful classes...couldn't be better. Thanks so much for the care you have taken to put these classes together on an app
Great way to fit yoga into daily life!
Love this and the alert features keep me on track.
Love it
Use too much space on my phone. And cannot move app data to SD card, the guide in FAQ not solve the problem.
Great app for when you're stuck in a rut and need to shake up your practice a bit!
Really nice guiding with a soothing voice.
The 30 minute class flew by. Only gripe is that the background music doesn't play when I Chromecast it and I can't figure out how to fix it.
I'm excited, it's great! I'm a beginner at yoga and it's PERFECT!
I love this app, I've had it for 3 years on my iPad lost the iPad just now got it on my smartphone, best yoga app in the world.

Certainly value for money! I really enjoy the classes. You need to download the individual lesson so you better do that before you want to start and you should have a WiFi connection. Otherwise awesome app
Easy to use and is great for a quick daily yoga practice, if you're familiar with yoga and the poses.
This app is everything I wanted from a yoga app. Simple and sensible with options for difficulty and length of sessions. Functions well. No problems at all.
I stand by it, im only on day 2 but it was so simple and calming that i shared it on social media. As a beginner its beautiful! 1Love

This would be a really good app, but for one thing. Its yoga programmes have to be downloaded and they use up masses of storage capacity. This is the opposite of what is promised. Possibly, I am doing something wrong, but if I can't find out what, the app will have to go.

I've been doing basic yoga moves for a few years to help with hip issues but needed something more. I lift weights 3 days a week and do cardio 4 days, I still have another 50lbs to lose so by no means in shape. This app has so much variety that I can use it after every workout. The moves are simple yet challenging for a beginner. I feel like I'll finally make progress in flexibility and keep from injury. This is a must have for all!
I loved this app on my old iPad that I no longer use. So I was ecstatic when it came out on Android finally. Works great and I love the calm and relaxed flow of the classes.
It kept telling me my data connection is off...   Refunded
This app has really taught me alot
Very slick app
Best app ever! Thank you!

I have always heard of Gaiam, and this app really helped me alot. Especially for myself as a face painter when I go and do gigs, this really helped me to avoid getting nervous and just go with the flow.
Just needs Google Fit integration and it would be perfect
Easy to use, great for beginners like me!

I tried searching for "dog" or "svanasana" but no results were shown. Search for "downward" or "upward" worked. What use is a search if you can only search for something linearly like this? I can scroll my way to the letter I want if I want to look for something alphabetically...
Absolutely love it
Quick to download, flawless playback, easy to use for yoga at home. Love this app.

I do love Yoga Studio and have used it for years on my iPad. I've just switched to the Android version and, though it's still very good (and I wouldn't be without it) the app needs a bit of work, so I'm afraid you lose a star!  You'll get it back once these little glitches are sorted out.
I surfed youtube and found nothing of this quality. I'm now doing yoga every single morning after my morning meditation. This app is pretty perfect, keep up the good work :)
This app gives you step by step instructions for poses and allows you to place poses together to make your own custom class. I wish I could give it more than 5 stars.
I practically use it everyday. I just wish there was a little bit more classes with other forms of yoga, more flexibility, etc. But it is super easy to use and great for beginners.
Well worth the money
Perfect for all levels and even has stretches for runners for anyone in athletics. Working my through the many classes and really enjoying.

Love the pre-made classes. The teacher has a soothing voice and guides you through nicely, telling you when to inhale and exhale and giving tips on how to do the position properly and/or adjust the position based on your needs.
Great app with everything you need to get started with Yoga. It's easy to use, snappy and has good quality of videos as well. Only negative that can be said is the omission of Chromecast support.
Worth it
Love it, got me back to yoga, I use it daily 😆

The host's voice is calming, the music is great if you like it, but can be turned off if you don't. I love that I can download classes to utilize even when I'm not in service. With so many classes \u0026amp; poses, I don't ever get bored with what this app offers.
Easy to follow poses. Lots of classes to choose from. Soothing voice over. I've been looking for something like this for ages. Worth the money.
This app is simply perfect! Love the schedule feature and the variety of the classes!

Really just a perfect yoga app. No flaws to speak of. I bought a yoga mat six months ago and never used it. Since I got this app I use it every day. Kudos to you guys for making yoga affordable for anyone to learn. Here's to improved health!
Excellent. Please add another languages (spanish) in the future.
It s only 10 Liras and it gives you a great library for a quick yoga exercise,  I use it after my work out routine to complete it and it's perfect.

Easy to follow videos. Customizable. Can listen to your music instead of built in app, and just get the instructor to teach or just name poses. Best once you've done the classes a few times. Couple of sync errors when just naming poses. 5 stars once that's fixed in an update.
Its like having a professional yoga class anytime you want
Would give it 6 stars if I could!
I'm so excited this is finally on Android.  Such a well thought out app.
Really enjoying the classes. There's a good selection of difficulty levels and class lengths.
Easy to follow and simple user interface. Continues to guide throughout the entire sequence, unlike some other apps that forget to tell you to switch sides.
Very impressive so far, thanks!

I can't download. It says that cellular data is off and should be turned on... It is on as all other apps are working.. is there a setting I should change? It looks like a lovely app but cannot really rate until I am able to use it.  Thanks and hope to hear from you soon
I had no yoga experience but it has helped me learn yoga from a basic level
Great app. User friendly but good for advancing and already advanced. Love the log , class options, music , and voice!!
My favorite yoga app, so glad it's finally on android too. Some minor glitches with the guided talk not matching poses, but other than that it's fantastic for all levels from beginner to expert!
Great for yoga on the go, quick yoga sessions and morning classes at home!
So easy to follow without looking at the screen
Easy to use,  simple....  Great job!

I had this app for years on my iPhone. So glad they made a version for android. This app is worth the initial cost. Pre-made classes that are great, high quality video of each move, the ability to customize your own class. Excellent all around.

You could easily pay 40-$90 a month for some yoga studios. As a beginner with some experience I found the videos easy to follow and very relaxing. And if there was a pose i want familiar with I could replay it until I knew how to transition. The narrator's voice is very calm and pleasant. And I love that the classes take you from beginner to intermediate to advanced all for only $3.99. You seriously cannot get a better value. I have recommended thus too many friends already.

Bought this app when it was on offer. Very well designed and I like the Chromecast functionality. The instructor describes how to get into each position but occasionally doesn't and/or it's hard to hear so I end up looking at the screen a lot. I would buy it again though, worth paying for. There are no ads or further in app purchases (that I can see).
Love this app best app 4 yoga lots of lessons and easy 2 follow
Loads different routines - even create custom ones - simple to use - great!
Love this app!!

I'm so glad I chose this app. I'm at a point with yoga where I want to do more, but regular classes are getting expensive and I'm not quite ready to guide myself without running out of ideas. The options here are so convenient. It flows well and you can schedule the classes creating a similar sense of accountability as if you had a real class booked. Roll out the mat and get bendy!

I've done yoga for years. This app is an excellent resource for doing yoga at home or on the go. I like the different levels and amounts of time available. I use this app frequently. I would love to see it continue to add classes, especially for back pain. I would  recommend this app to anyone.
Can I get a refund since I can't use this app at all??? 🙇
Absolutely wonderful, more than I could have ever hope for!
Tons of programs, no hidden fees, great instruction and guidance and flow. Better than any other app I've tried.
It feels like you are actually sitting in a yoga studio and following the instructor. Best of both worlds. Can do it anywhere and still have the feel of guided class.
I love this app, makes for a great yoga experience.  My toddlers even do it with me!

Best app I've ever purchased. Coming back to yoga after many years away. Perfect for all levels, moods and daily practice. I've recommended it to sveral friends/family and they all love it too. Can choose 5-60 min classes, beginner, intermediate or advanced and choose flexibility, strength, relaxation or combo classes. It's awesome. I wish they'd make one just like it for pilates!!!
Great program. Easy to use with a wide variety of classes at varying difficultly levels. At 99 cents, it's a steal.
Easy to use and gives clear video and voice instructions so even a beginner like me could pick it up immediately! Classes cover all lengths, skill levels and intensities. Amazing value!
Absolute must have.
Excellent software and yoga.
Perfect for beginners and busy persons ! And cheap ;)
Provide yoga for each ailment.
I did yoga for years but after having a child I didn't have time, this app helps me fit it in to my life again. Yeah!
This is the best yoga app I have experienced.  Relaxing and the schedule feature is great!
High quality,  photos,  video (need to download,  but are included with app).  Every position has a description of how to do,  and what it benefits. I highly recommend this app!
The end of the sessions end rather abruptly, but besides that, the app is great! It shows each position making it easier to understand.

I'm a teacher in AZ, so spending a ton of money on yoga classes isn't really an option most of the time, but this app has been pretty great at detailing yoga positions through videos for me wherever I want to get my yoga on. I'm primarily a runner (not a yoga enthusiast, to cheap) and I feel like I have never had great ending stretches until now. I love the pacing and all the leveled options. I already have my phone with me all the time so the convenience is wonderful as well. Affordable yoga, yes please!
Although this is a beautifully designed app,  I could not get the video to work.
More classes, detail and poses than I thought a yoga app would have.  I was delightfully surprised.  Well worth the price.
Mix of strength, flexibility and relaxing session's tailored to all skill levels as well as sun salutations etc.. highly recommended.
gets off sync when you try to fast forward or rewind
Great for traveling or for a day off from the gym. Great levels and poses.

Simply great and easy to use! - What I miss, is a "placeholder" pose (with editable name) to represent my "exotic" poses, not (yet) contained in the built in pose library. And all the stuff should be stored on the EXTERNAL sdcard, optionally.

I've tried all the yoga and workout apps. This one surpasses the rest. This has the best set of classes at the perfect skill levels. And you can create your own routines. I was hesitant to pay $5 for it but I've used it almost everyday since installing it and I'm more willing to pay one payment of $5 than monthly payments of $2 or whatever the subscription apps cost. Great app! Recommend it to beginning yogis and experienced ones.
Great. Real good audio, voice, animation and vibe....

I loved it in the apple version and was excited when they finally brought it to android. Only issue I have are some classes that are delayed with the instructions vs. When they do the actual pose itself. Other than that, I still love it and grateful to have it back!

It is so cheap for what it offers!! Only warning is the classes do have to be downloaded to your device so if your memory is limited you might not want this. So many class options and levels and lengths!
Worth the money! Love the different levels and focus options. The app works well.
Awesome sauce
I used this app everyday two years ago, when I was using iOS. Then I changed to Android but I've been longing for this app ever since!
Very helpful
Super simple UI.Also, being someone who didn't know very much about yoga, it has been a great starting point and I'm excited to get to the more challenging sessions.
Loved it iPhone.. happy to see it on Android as well!!
I have been using Yoga Studio for two years and just adore it! Thanks you for adding it to Google play!!😙
Excellent...
So happy you finally made a version for android. So easy to use, and as a beginner, I really appreciate ur classes, I can feel my body improve every session.
I don't often do yoga as I don't like the meditating part of it. But this one is relaxing without weird stuff :-)) easy app to use and easy to follow

I really love the choice of lessons, from beginners to advanced, the choice of style of yoga and duration of class... it's a lovely pace, not rushed, well explained and even a choice of background music. I'm back into my yoga and wanting to find the time to do it...excellent app!! Thank you!
This is an amazing app and is worth much more than the price.  Thank you so much Gaiam .
Amazing for all levels and great that you can customise too!

Please fix this volume issue sometimes teachers voice is disable and not sync with the exercise. Video takes 10 minutes to start. Sometimes it won't play at all, I used to simply stare at phone with my yoga mat ready and fall asleep.
Great for someone looking to begin or jump back jnto yoga!!
Had this years ago and it's better than I remembered.
Lot of varied time and pose sequences. Good for whether you practice vinyasa, bikram, or any other yoga. Keeps you motivated to come back and do more.
Amazing app for only $1.
I've only followed a few classes so far but this yoga app is certainly proving to be worth every penny and better than others I've tried :)

Having been an ex yoga practitioner I am liking that I can easy myself back into the practice at my own pace. No Pressure No Judgement. Have yet to explore the rest of the videos but certainly looking forward to it.
Nice flow of routines and a wide variety to choose from.
I've been using this app for a couple weeks now, and I absolutely love it. It's soothing, and guides you step by step, and I've enjoyed every class.
I'm fairly new to yoga and this app guides you threw it brilliantly and at a steady pace, with plenty of classes at higher levels if your more experienced.
For sure worth the money. I like the variety of classes and the ability to make your own practice. The app has the classes arranged according to your goals for your class.
Loved the routines I am on beginners now; super routines...
Done several classes so far and loved them all!  Best yoga app I've found!

After various injuries and a loss of discipline i ended up gaining 50 pounds. During the binge i developed all the flexibility of a 1980s action figure. This app allows me to bend my body like a german torture porn with the added benefit that no one but me can hear me cry.

I am a beginner to yoga. I feel great after doing one of these classes! They explain everything so well, I love how they let you learn about specific poses, I love how you can schedule in a class into your calendar... much more. I really am enjoying using this daily!

I have been doing yoga for over 50 years and this is the best yoga resource I have found. There is a large number of classes covering different areas of the body and offering different levels to suit beginner to advanced. The instruction is presented in a very soft clear voice with nice background music giving lots of tips for correct technique.

Its everything I looked for in a yoga app. There is a human doing the poses so you can tell exactly how you should look, let's you go into poses without starting exercise to see how they are done, has pre-made classes and let's you customize your own uses poses you like. I'm so glad I made the purchase.
Love that you can create your own sequence!

This app is exactly what I've been looking for in a yoga app. I love that the classes are divided into difficulty plus have different lengths of time for most of them. I barely use it with my chromecast. I find myself just playing the class videos right off my phone.
Great for beginner of yoga to get started.
Love love love it!! Why paying lots of money for yoga classes is you can do all of that in your own room / backyard / wherever for $2?!

I have just completed my first class and I am already in love! The pace is perfect, love that you can edit the volume of the music and the teacher independently from each other. I am looking forward to creating custom classes for myself. Thank you for such an amazing app! ♡
Excellent!!! This app includes all of the difficult poses I'm currently attempting to master!
Best yoga app in market

This was recommended to me by a friend and I love it! Very easy for beginners to follow and I love that I can do 10/15 minute sessions for when I have no time, well done, best yoga app by far, videos flow brilliantly.

Have used this app for several years now but just changed my phone to android and was a pain to use my old phone for the app. Thank you! Love this app and there is something for everyone and if you're feeling a bit lazy there's something for that too!

I absolutely loved this app on iPhone and was so upset when I switched to Android and it wasn't available. No other yoga app compares. The soothing voiceover, the customizable classes, the scheduling, the pose dictionary ... This app is amazing.
Splendid app: everything you could want in a yoga app and more. You can customise routines, the background music/ sound effects and more. Definitely worth a buy!

I'm in yoga teacher training. I love this app so far, and I've only used the beginner videos. I just wish savasana could be a little longer! 😭 and maybe the music could fade out instead of abruptly stopping - it kind of takes away from the mood of finishing a good yoga sesh. Overall though, I love the app!

The best yoga app on any app store. There are loads of classes, all very well put together and you can create your own. The classes cater to different goals and ability levels. The community is great as well, the FB page is always active. The yoga teacher from the app responds to queries and has brought together a great community you can feel part of. Highly recommended.

All the other yoga apps are horrible you have to keep selecting what move you wanna do theres no flow to em. This one has that, it has flow. Its very instructive for those who have never done yoga and a hell off a lot cheaper then a real yoga class. Plus woth the benefits of work out in the comfort of my own home. I love it i would five 10 stars if i could
I'm a user of both OS systems (iOS \u0026amp; Android). This is by far the most useful app in the stores. You can chose follows the classes or build your own. Kudos
I trained as a yoga instructor but this wonderful app let's me enjoy being a student again. Namaste.
